questionTitle: Buy the new ________ of soap now on sale: it is softer than others!
My uncle took ________ golf when he retired from work.
There has been a rather worrying ________ ten per cent in our profits this year.
________ you hurry, you won't catch the bus.
The customer, who was shouting at the top of his voice, ________ his money back.
I ________ him to go to the Lost Property office to see if his umbrella had been found.
I couldn't resist having another slice of cake even ________ I was supposed to be losing weight.
These old houses are going to be ________ soon.
________ as I like ice-cream, I couldn't eat any more now, thank you.
You may borrow as many books as you like, provided you show them to ________ is at the desk.
What do you mean, he's watching television? He's ________ to be washing the car.
She was angry with me for breaking the plate, but it happened quite ________ accident.
The hall was very crowded with over fifty people ________ into it.
Beware of the people who appear to be enthusiastic ________ your success.
They want to watch a football game ________ TV.
________ to leave early is rarely granted.
________, they didn't laugh at me.
If you had gone there last year, you ________ my brother.
I never go in lifts because I am terrified of ________ spaces.
It never ________ to me that he would be here.
